treatment.description: Inflorescences: spikes laxly palmate, each stipitate with elongate, slender, sterile bracteate base, fertile part rarely over 10 cm. Floral bracts to 3 cm.
treatment.discussion: This variety appears to hybridize with Tillandsia fasciculata var. densispica.
treatment.habitat: Epiphytic on a variety of hosts, usually in bright light
